summary: "Sunset Boulevard" is a classic 1950 American movie directed by Billy Wilder. It's about a struggling writer, Joe Gillis (William Holden), who gets entangled in the strange world of Norma Desmond (Gloria Swanson), a former silent-film star. She wants to make a comeback, and her butler, Max (Erich von Stroheim), helps her. The film shows how Hollywood can be both glamorous and dark. It was very popular and won three Academy Awards. Many people think it's one of the best movies ever made.
title: Sunset Boulevard (film)
